definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl

pinyin: bing3 tong2 suan1 tuo1 qing1 mei2
dui4 an1 ji1 ben3 bing3 tong2

sentences.english: I've got one in the notes, it's just acetone and chloroform.
sentences.chinese: 我在笔记中写了一个，它是丙酮和氯仿。

sentences.english: Color reaction with acetylacetone is used to determine the formaldehyde content in fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 织物中甲醛的测定大多采用乙酰丙酮的显色反应。

sentences.english: The glycerol is converted into dihydroxyacetone phosphate which enters glycolysis .
sentences.chinese: 甘油可转化为二羟丙酮磷酸，并进入糖酵解。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the biological properties of pyruvate decarboxylase and its application.
sentences.chinese: 该文综述了丙酮酸脱羧酶生物学性质及其应用前景。

sentences.english: The blend treated mechanically was extracted by xylon and aceton one by one.
sentences.chinese: 经过力化学处理过的混合物用二甲苯和丙酮逐一浸取。

sentences.english: The glycerol is converted into dihydroxyacetone phosphate which enters glycolysis.
sentences.chinese: 甘油可转化为二羟丙酮磷酸，并进入糖酵解。

sentences.english: II. Take a clean rag or cloth with acetone and apply to the joint.
sentences.chinese: 拿一块干净的抹布或蘸有丙酮的布擦拭接合处。

sentences.english: When wheat plants allowed to become deficient in potassium, pyruvate kinase activity increased.
sentences.chinese: 当小麦植株令其缺钾时，丙酮酸激酶活性随之升高。

sentences.english: In order to confirm this hypothesis, benzophenone was used instead of acetone .
sentences.chinese: 在以证实这一假说，二苯甲酮是用来代替丙酮。

sentences.english: Pyruvate and dihydroxyacetone are all three carbon metabolites of carbohydrate metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 丙酮酸和二羟丙酮都是糖代谢过程中的三碳化合物。

sentences.english: Pyruvate and dihydroxyacetone are all three carbon metabolites of carbohydrate metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 丙酮酸和二羟丙酮都是糖代谢过程中的三碳化合物。

sentences.english: Some holoenzymes , such as pyruvate dehydrogenase , are highly complex , with several cofactors.
sentences.chinese: 有一些全酶是高度复杂的，如丙酮酸脱氢酶。

sentences.english: The effects of triacetoneamine concentration on hydrogenation and amination were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了三丙酮胺纯度对加氢和还原胺化反应的影响。

sentences.english: These two amino acids derive their carbon skeletons from pyruvate .
sentences.chinese: 这两个氨基酸从丙酮酸获得它们的碳架。

sentences.english: The solvent acetone is occluded into the cage alone, it can be removed easily.
sentences.chinese: 笼内仅吸留易于除去的溶剂丙酮。

definition: ethanol C2H5OH/same as alcohol 酒精
